local_intent: Perform the straight push to the +X (0 deg) direction on the T block, then clear and verify goal overlap.
assumptions: Goal region is detectable for post-push verification
Contact is achievable within the allowed descent depth
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT second push (direction_deg=0, distance=0.1) following perception, approach/alignment, contact establishment, then retreat and goal check.
